revision.text:
{{codepointer|Doom|Monster AI}}'''A_SkelWhoosh''' {{doomwiki|A_SkelWhoosh}}
(no parameters)
Plays the sound "skeleton/swing" and calls [[A_FaceTarget]].
== Examples == This example is taken from Doom's {{Class|Revenant}}.
Melee: SKEL G 0 [[A_FaceTarget]] SKEL G 6 [[A_SkelWhoosh]] SKEL H 6 [[A_FaceTarget]] SKEL I 6 [[A_SkelFist]] Goto See
